text: Espelkamp is a town in Minden-Lübbecke in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. About 25,000 people live there. == Twin towns == Espelkamp is twinned with: * Angermünde, Germany * Borås, Sweden * Nagykőrös, Hungary * Torgelow, Germany == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Minden- Lübbecke Rural District
title: Espelkamp
